text: Le Chesnay is a former French commune. It is in the western suburbs of Paris 16.7 km (10.4 mi) from the center. About 30,227 people lived here in 2006. André-Mignot Hospital is located in the city. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Le Chesnay-Rocquencourt.Arrêté préfectoral 29 November 2018 == Education == * Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines == References == Category:Former communes in Yvelines
title: Le Chesnay
